message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $150. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to me. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested but $150 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. Would you be willing to go down to $110?  I'm sure we can work something out.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $110 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $125.  This is a great deal for a product of this quality.  Let me know if you're interested!

Alice,  I appreciate you coming down in price.  $125 is still a little more than I want to spend. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $117.50?  I really want this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  How about we split the difference at $121.25? This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with this product.
